name: MeltDown (itch) (MCMGameStudio)
description:
You are a small ice creature trying to stop the world from getting too hot.

This a platformer, but your character slides around and bounces off walls uncontrollably. You slowly melt as you go along, causing yourself to become more slippery unless you can find an ice bath. If you melt before that happens, you die.

Controls:
Move - A and D / Arrow keys
Jump - Space
Pause - Escape
Enter gate - E

Info:

All art, code and music was created during the jam. Sound effects were taken from https://freesound.org/.
